tool_description: Performs comprehensive quality control checks on soil testing data, validating against standard procedures, checking for systematic errors, and ensuring data integrity.

sample_ids.description: List of sample IDs to check

qc_standards.description: QC standards to apply (ASTM, AASHTO, BS, internal)

duplicate_tolerance.description: Acceptable percentage difference for duplicate tests

blank_tolerance.description: Maximum acceptable value for blank tests

trend_analysis.description: Check for systematic trends or drift

error_messages: Invalid sample IDs: One or more sample IDs do not exist in the dataset.
Unsupported QC standards: Use combinations of [ASTM, AASHTO, BS, internal].
Invalid tolerance values: duplicate_tolerance and blank_tolerance must be positive numbers.
Insufficient QC data: Cannot perform comprehensive quality control with available data.
Missing calibration records: Equipment calibration data required but not available.
usage: Specify sample_ids and qc_standards to perform quality control checks. Configure tolerance values and enable specific QC analyses as needed.

failed_checks.description: List of failed QC check descriptions
